definition[0]: a type of toothpaste sold in the US and the UK
definition[1]: the top or highest point of something such as a hill or a wave
example[0]: It took us over an hour to reach the crest of the hill.
definition[2]: a special picture that is used as a sign of a family, town, school, or organization
definition[3]: a group of feathers that stick up on the top of a birdâ€™s head
definition[4]: a decoration of long bright feathers that soldiers wore in the past on top of their hats
definition[5]: to reach the top of a hill or mountain
example[2]: They crested a wooded hill shortly before sunset.
definition[6]: the name given to the London STOCK EXCHANGE's system of buying and selling stock, shares etc using computers
definition[7]: in Britain and Ireland, an electronic system of making payments when trading shares etc
